content.rendered:
Ref: CXP125/2025

Highly experienced Tech Project Manager with a strong background in mechanical or electrical engineering. Overseeing industrial machine and equipment installations / removals, and site preparation activities in an OPERATIONAL PLANT ENVIRONMENT.
Salary: Market related – depending on experience and qualifications
Location: Westmead, Pinetown

Criteria:
Diploma / Degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering (or a related field).
Extensive experience in industrial, mechanical, electrical project management
Proven track record in site-based, on-the-ground project execution.
Strong ability to interpret engineering drawings and translate them into executable action plans.
Experience managing contractors and executing projects in an industrial setting.
Ability to work under pressure and adapt to changing priorities in a dynamic plant environment.
Physically fit and certified to work at Heights

Apply via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
